scripts.use:dev-staging: ENV_STP=staging && cp config/$ENV_STP/.env apps/stp-backend/.env && cp config/$ENV_STP/env.json apps/stp-backend/env.json && cp config/$ENV_STP/service-account.json apps/stp-backend/service-account.json && firebase use $ENV_STP
